brainly_data.question: The ancient Romans are known for their accomplishments in engineering. The Romans provided water to their cities and used indoor plumbing. What else did the Romans build that was an important part of their water system?
brainly_data.subject: History

all_answers.question: The ancient Romans are known for their accomplishments in engineering. The Romans provided water to their cities and used indoor plumbing. What else did the Romans build that was an important part of their water system?
all_answers.subject: History
all_answers.text: They made Channels underground a lined with clay to prevent sepage in the surrounding soil. They were a big contribution and we still do something inspired by that today.

top_answer.question: The ancient Romans are known for their accomplishments in engineering. The Romans provided water to their cities and used indoor plumbing. What else did the Romans build that was an important part of their water system?
